input.content:
Observation:
Select 0 with the slider and hit Submit.
8
Action:

```
offset = 0 - 8
agent.click_xpath("//span[@tabindex='0']")
press_key = 'arrowleft' if offset < 0 else 'arrowright'
for _ in range(abs(offset)):
    agent.press(press_key)
agent.click_xpath("//*[@id='subbtn']")
```

Observation:
Select 54 with the slider and hit Submit.
51
Action:

output:
```
offset = 54 - 51
agent.click_xpath("//span[@tabindex='0']")
press_key = 'arrowright' if offset > 0 else 'arrowleft'
for _ in range(abs(offset)):
    agent.press(press_key)
agent.click_xpath("//*[@id='subbtn']")
```
